name: MONOTONIA: First Contact
description:
WHAT'S INCLUDED IN MONOTONIA: FIRST CONTACT



In the prologue of MONOTONIA, you will discover the events that precede the main game campaign. Experience the initial work cycles, pay off your debts, and survive in a dark and oppressive work system!

FEATURES

With just one button, evade resistances, generate as much energy as possible, and be rewarded based on your performance.


Choose one of the available upgrades at the end of each cycle.

Manage your debts and survive for as long as you can.
